subject: Re: [junit] JUnit and JDK1.4.2
msgSnippet: Congratulations. Looks like your tests are doing their job. ... -- Malcolm Sparks Congreve Computing http://www.congreve.com
messageBody:
Congratulations. Looks like your tests are doing their job.

On Tue, 2003-09-30 at 23:59, Karthikeyan Ramnath wrote:
> Has anyone encountered problems while using JDK1.4.2? We were using
> JDK1.4.1_03 for development, and I was just trying to test out our product
> on the newer JDK, but the JUnit test cases would not run.
> Certain components like menuitems are not being found. The problems are
> repeatable but they are localised to certain tests alone and are not present
> across test cases.
> tia,
> kr.
> ---------------------------------
> The will to do, the soul to dare
